128194.「やァ <pc>君。\n 先ほどは 見苦しい所を見せてしまったね。\n 前回の非:
Hey . I'm sorry I showed you something unsightly ze other day. Let me apologize for that, as well as for my rudeness
last time.

128195.「……本当に すまなかった。 \n 僕は どうやら 誤解していたようだ。: I'm really sorry. It seems I misunderstood.

128196.「つまり 僕は その……\n ヒーたんに 悪い虫がついたんじゃないかと \n 心:
I mean, I vas worried that, my sister might
have gotten a bad bug.

128197.「ヒーたん 自分では 一人前のつもりだけど\n 純粋っていうか 世間ズレしてない:
Sister, you think you're on your own, but you're not pure or out of touch with ze world, right? I'm worried that some strange
person might be deceiving me.

128198.「だからいつも 妹に近づく人間には\n つい 警戒しすぎてしまってね。\n あん:
That's why I've always been so wary of people
who approach my sister. I'm sorry I behaved
like that, but...

128200.「あのルーペ 僕が妹にあげたものなんだ。 \n じつは 僕も昔は 学者になる夢が:
That loupe I gave to my sister. I used to dream of being a scholar. I used to never tire of looking through illustrated books when I
was a kid.

128201.「でも結局 僕は 家業を継ぐことを優先した。\n 今の仕事は好きだし 向いている:
But in ze end, I decided to take over ze
family business. I like my job, I'm good at
it, and it's going great. But...

128202.「正直 負い目があったんだ。: To be honest, I felt guilty.

128203.「ヒーたんが 考古学者になったのは\n 僕が あきらめざるを得なかった 夢を\n:
I thought that when my sister became an
archaeologist, she was trying to take ze
place of ze dream I had to give up.

128204.「だから それで ヒーたんが苦しむのは\n 我慢ならなかった。あのルーペが呪縛に:
So I couldn't stand to see my sister suffer
because of it. I couldn't allow that loupe to
become a curse and cause my sister to suffer.

128205.「だけど さっきの あの子の言葉を聞いて \n 心が 軽くなった気がしたよ。彼女:
But after hearing her words earlier, I felt
lightened. I realized that she had already
been pursuing her own dream!

128206.「メルシー <pc>君！ あんな妹だが\n これからも 仲良くしてやってくれたま:
Merci <pc>! She's such a little
sister, but please continue to be good to her.

128207.「おっと……そろそろ 船の時間が近いようだ。\n 名残惜しいが もう行かないと。:
Oops...looks like it's almost time for ze
boat. I'm sorry to leave you, but I have to
go. Farewell <pc>! Have a nice trip!

128220.「うーん 気持ちいいな！\n こういうの 一度 やってみたかったんだ。\n 行儀:
Zis feels so good! I've always vanted to
try something like zis'. It's so raw, but
it's so exciting!

128221.「きれいだなぁ……\n リンジャーラたちも こんな風に\n 星を 見ていたんだろ:
It's so beautiful... I vonder if Linjara and
ze others were looking at ze stars like
zis.

128222.「兄の 言うとおりなんだ。 \n キミが苦労して 手記を 手に入れてくれたのに\:
My brother vas right. You went through all
zat trouble to receive ze journal, and I
couldn't do anything about it.

128223.「さ……最初は 新発見かと 注目されたのだが \n 証拠となる遺跡が見つからなく:
Well... at first, it vas touted as a new discovery, but since no archaeological evidence has been found to support it, no one
listens to me anymore. I'm not sure.

128224.「もう 考古学なんて やめてしまおうか！\n 今からでもさ 身体をマッチョにして:
I'm not doing archeology anymore! I mean,
vat's wrong with getting a little stronger
and going on a road trip with you, right?

128225.「……なんてね。ウソだよ。\n だから そんな困った顔を しないでくれ。\n キ:
Hey, I vas kidding. So don't make such a
troubled face. You really are a kind person.

128226.「キミは 私のために \n このルーペを 探しだしてくれた。\n キミが得するこ:
You found zis loupes for me. You don't
deserve any trouble.

128227.「フフ。キミみたいに ステキな人が友達なのに\n 私も クサッてなんか いられな:
Mon ami. I can't be a jerk vhen I have a
vonderful person like you as a friend, can I?

128228.「考古学が大好きだから こんなに くやしいし \n 捨て去ることなんて できそう:
I love archaeology so much, it's such a
bummer, and I don't think I could ever get rid
of it.

128229.「今日は そばにいてくれて ありがとう。 \n いつかキミが 助けを必要としてい:
Merci beaucoup, mon ami. Someday if you ever
need help, I'll be there for you.

128230.「さて そろそろ 下に戻ろうか。\n 遅くなってしまったから\n クロニコが 心:
Well, it's time to get back downstairs.
Chronico might be worried about me since it's
getting late.

128232.「ぜぇぜぇ…… かっ 勝ったの……か？: Oh man, did ve win...or what?

128233.「や やった！\n <cs_pchero>との 友情パワーで\n 魔物を 倒した:
Y-yes! I...defeated the monsters vith ze
power of friendship vith <cs_pchero>...!

128234.「これは……？\n ファラスの手記では なさそうだな。\n どれどれ……:
Is zis'...? It doesn't look like Faras's
journal. Let's see...

128235.今日は 友人と３人で 年に一度の夜祭りへ\n出かけた。親友のアイツと それから…:
Today, a friend of mine and I went to the annual night festival with three other people. My best friend, that guy, and... her,
who came a little later.

128236.いつもは 静かなこの地も 祭りの夜には \n色とりどりの灯りで あざやかに彩られ:
This normally quiet place is filled with
colorful lights and the sound of people's
voices on festival nights.

128237.珍しい食べ物に ゆかいな催し物 美しい花火……\n夢か幻のような時の中で 私たち:
We laughed and laughed in a time that seemed
like a dream or a vision. And just as we were
about to head home...

128238.ふたりが先日 婚約したという話を聞いた。\n両者とも 人として尊敬できる 大切な:
I heard that they got engaged the other day.
Both of them are dear friends whom I respect
as people. I offered my congratulations.

128239.その後 私たちは 我々３人にとって\n思い出の場所である丘で 流星をながめながら:
Afterwards, we stood on a hill, a memorable place for all three of us, watching the meteors and pledging our everlasting
friendship.

128240.ふたりに出会うことができて 本当によかった。\nこの先 何があっても 私たち３人:
I am so glad that I was able to meet you both. I know that no matter what happens in the future, the three of us will be able to laugh
our way through it.

128241.「め……目がッ！！ \n ブリリアントすぎて 目がしみるぅぅ！！: Mon eyes! Such a brilliant story! They sting!

128242.「わ 私の経験した 灰色の青春とは \n 異次元の 輝きぶりに\n ヒストリカ:
What an experience of brilliance on a whole
other level in my gray youth! Historica is in
Jurassic Panic!

128244.「しかし 彼はなぜ あんな強力な魔物を……\n よほど日記を 見られたくなかった:
But why vould he vant such a powerful
monster to guard his diary? Linjara is a very
mysterious boy.

128245.「ひ…ひさしぶりに はげしい運動をしたから \n 予想以上に 身体にガタがきてい:
It's been a vhile since I've had a vigorous workout, so my body is feeling a little more tired than I expected. I think I'll take a
little rest outside.

128246.「わっ…… 私の研究をジャマする奴は\n 誰であっても 許さんぞ！:
I vill not allow anyone to interfere vith'
my research!

128247.「カモン！\n ヒストリカ ウィズ <cs_pchero>の\n 友情パワーで:
Come on! Historica vith <cs_pchero> and
ze power of friendship vill crush you!

128248.「ボンジュール！ ヒストリカとその友人！\n さァ 妹よ！ 荷物は まとめたか！:
Bonjour! Historica and friends! Come on,
little sister! Have you packed your bags?
Let's go back to Home Sweet Home!

128250.「ウィ！ 承知した！ 帰らないんだな！ \n ならば兄は ひとりで帰るぞォ！:
Oui! Yes! You're not going home! Then I'm
going home alone!

128251.「……って か か か 帰らないだと！？: Y.. Y.. You're not going home?!

128252.「イエス！ 家には 帰らないよ！\n 私はここで 研究を続ける。:
Oui! Oui! I'm not going home! I vill stay
here and continue my research.

128253.「やめろやめろ！ バカバカしい。\n 考古学など続けても 何も成せやしない。\n:
Stop, stop! This is nonsense. All zis'
archaeology is not going to help you. You know
that, don't you?

128254.「この先には もっと苦しいことしか無いぞ。\n まだ 恥をかきたいのか？\n お:
There's only more pain ahead. You still vant'
to humiliate yourself? Have you no pride?

128255.「フン！ そうだな！\n そんな下らないモノが プライドというのなら\n ドッグ:
Hmph! You're right! If pride is such a trivial
thing, let it be dog food!

128256.「私は <pc>に あきらめないと誓った。\n ならば 恥をかいても カッコ悪く:
I swore to that I vould' never give up. Then it is my pride to keep it, no matter how embarrassing or uncool it may
be!!!!

128257.「兄さんの言うとおり \n 私は 学会で 皆から失笑を買ったよ。\n 今でも く:
You were right, I vas laughed at by everyone
at ze conference. I'm still bitter, but...

128258.「私は これのおかげで\n 学問を 楽しいと思えるようになったし\n こんなに:
It's made learning fun for me, and I've found
something I'm so passionate about.

128259.「今 苦しいからって この研究をやめたら \n きっと この先 一生後悔すると思:
If I stop zis research just because I'm in pain now, I'm sure I'll regret it for ze rest of my life. That's why I don't vant to give
up so easily.

128261.「……お前は 本当に 愚かな妹だよ。 \n デカいクチをたたくのはタダだが すっ:
You really are a foolish sister. You can smack me vith your big mouth for free, but if you have to go through something very painful, I
von't know about it anymore.

128262.「ウッ……どうしても ダメだった時は\n 優しく おうちに迎えて欲しいかナ……:
Well... if it doesn't work out, I'd like you
to welcome me home gently...

128263.「フン。今さら かわいく言っても遅いわ！ \n 兄は ひとりで帰るからな！ あー:
Hmph. It's too late to be cute now! I'm going
home alone! Oh, poor brother. Poor brother!

128264.「……<pc>君 話がある。\n １階の 出口で待っているよ。:
...<pc> I need to talk to you, I'll
be waiting for you at ze exit on the first
floor.

128268.「こっ この 天板 開きそうだぞ！\n 新たな発見に ヒストリカ イズ エキサイ:
Oh, my God, zis top panel is about to open!
Historica is excited about zis new discovery!

128279.「シャラーップ！ ブラザー！\n と…友達ならいる！ ここにいるぞ！！\n 私の:
Shallap Brother! I 'ave a friend 'ere! Mon
ami <pc>!

128284.「それじゃァ さっそく 用件を話そう。 \n ヒストリカ 今から うちへ帰るぞ。:
Vel then, let's get to ze point. Historica,
ve're going home now. Your brother's orders.
Pack your things quickly!

128286.「なにを突然！ ケンカを売っているのか！？ \n お前なんか兄じゃなくて アンポ:
Vat are you doing all of a sudden?! Are you trying to pick ze fisticuffs vit me? You're not my brother. You're stupide! Stop
sleepwalking and get ze hell out of 'ere!

128287.「お前 相変わらず 兄に対して容赦ないな……。:
You're as merciless towards your brother as
ever...

128288.「コホン！ 妹がひどくても 兄は負けんぞ！ \n さっきのは 寝言でも冗談でもな:
Ahem! My sister may be bad, but I von't let
her beat me! I vasn't joking in my sleep! I'm
telling you to stop being an archaeologist!

128289.「フッ そこのキミも 友人ぐらい選びたまえよ。\n こいつは 子供のころ ルーペ:
You should at least choose a better friend.
She vas so creepy as a kid, she'd burn straw
dolls vith a magnifying glass.

128290.「シャラーーーーーーーッッップンヌ！！\n ミーの名誉を損なう中傷は やめたまえ:
SHALLAP! Stop vith ze slander against moi's
honor! I let ze intellectual side of me get
curious about Warataro!

128291.「……損なわれるような 名誉があるのか？: ...vat honor is there to be damaged?

128292.「この間の研究発表 ひどかったそうじゃないか。 \n 突拍子もない 妄想を語って:
I heard your presentation ze other day was terrible. You went out of your way to make people laugh at your outlandish fantasies,
didn't you?

128293.「ち ちがう！ あれは まだ \n 証拠となる遺跡が 見つかっていないだけで\n:
No, no, no! It's just that ve haven't yet
found any evidence of ze existence of ze
ancient Ethene Kingdom, and zis journal...

128294.「だから それが 古代人の創作ではなく\n 史実であると 証明できなかったんだろ:
So you couldn't prove that it vas a historical fact, not a creation of ze ancients, could you? That's not scholarship,
that's just fantasy.

128295.「あァ そうか！ そんなんだから\n 学会で すっかり干されているのかァ！\n:
Oh, I see! That's vhy you're all dried up in
ze academic world! You're so dreamy, aren't
you!

128296.「……クロニコ。となりの部屋から \n マキ割り用のオノを 持ってきなさい。: Chronico. Go get ze axe from ze next room.

128297.「ダメだよ。ヒストリカ\n マキじゃないものを 割る気でしょ。:
Eh, no. You're trying to chop something not
historical.

128298.「フッ。このままでは ラチが明かないようだ。 \n 腹も空いたし いったん 僕は:
Huh. I guess ve're not going to get anywhere at zis point. I'm hungry, so I'm going to leave for now. I'll be back later, so pack
your things.

128301.「はっはっはァ！\n 相変わらず 友人も恋人も いないんだろう！\n 案ずるな！:
Haugh! Haugh! I see you still have no friends
an no lover! Don't worry madamoiselle! Your
brother is 'ere!

128303.「あァ失礼！ 存在感が あまりに薄いので \n 道ばたの石かと思ってたよ！ こん:
Oh, excusez-moi. I thought it was just a rock
on the side of ze road. What an odd person
you are, coming to 'dis remote tower!

128304.「僕はロジクル。しがない貿易商さ。 \n 愚妹が 世話になっているようだね。\n:
Je m'appelle Logical. I am how you say, a
humble trader. I see my sister is taking care
of you. Chronico, it's been a while.

131811.「やった 開いたっ！\n あ あれ？ 上に 何か書かれている。:
It's open! Oh, vat's that? Zere's something
written on ze top.

131812.祭壇の中に 邪悪で強大なる存在を 封印せり。\n何があっても 決して 開くべから:
Into the Sealed Altar, we seal the evil and
mighty. Never open it, no matter what
happens. - Summoner Linjara.

131813.「こ…これぐらいのことで あきらめるものか！: I von't give up just because of zis'!

131814.「ヒストリカ ウィズ <cs_pchero>の\n 友情パワーで お前をぶっつぶ:
Historica vith <cs_pchero> and
ze power of friendship vill crush you!

134105.「……はは。\n この前は 見苦しいところを\n 見せてしまったな。:
Ha-ha... I showed you how unsightly I vas'
ze other day.

134106.「だから もう一度 がんばってみるよ。: So I'll try my best again.

134108.ヒストリカ博士は 祭壇の天板を\nチカラまかせに 外したようだ！:
Dr. Historica seems to have removed the top of
the Altar by sheer force!

134177.「キミはすばらしい人だ！ \n 僕には 有能なエージェントがいてね。\n キミの:
You are a wonderful person! I have a very
reliable agent. He told me all about you.
